scripts.cv: rimraf out/default && hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/default/resume.all
scripts.cv-flat: rimraf out/flat && hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/flat/resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-flat
scripts.cv-modern: rimraf out/modern && hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/modern/resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-modern
scripts.cv-kendall: rimraf out/kendall && hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/kendall/resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-kendall
scripts.cv-class: rimraf out/class && hackmyresume BUILD resume.json TO out/class/resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-class
